qas.question: Who was elected as President in 2005?
What body made the declaration of who won the presidency?
How long was it since Vieira had held the office of president?
What year did Vieira first assume power?
Whose government did Vieira topple in 1980?

context: <a0_0>João Bernardo "Nino" Vieira<a0_0/> was elected in 2005 as President of Guinea-Bissau as an independent, being declared winner of the second round by the <a1_0>CNE (Comité Nacional de Eleições)<a1_0/>. Vieira returned to power in 2005 <a2_0>six years<a2_0/> after being ousted from office during a civil war. Previously, he held power for 19 years after taking power in <a3_0>1980<a3_0/> in a bloodless coup. In that action, he toppled the government of <a4_0>Luís Cabral<a4_0/>.
